feed.title: Habitica Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.34.2 Hotfixes
entry.content:
API

  • Fix: Restore translation of system chat messages (@phillipthelen)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

Client

  • Refactor: Adapt image display in notifications to Sprite component (@phillipthelen)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.34.3 Jade Hotfix
entry.content:
API

  • Fix: Correct release date of Jade Hatching Potion (@phillipthelen)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

Client

  • Fix: Show only Gems in currency display for changing Class (@CuriousMagpie)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.35.0 April 2025 Content
entry.content:
API

  • Content: Item releases for April 2025 (@CuriousMagpie and @SabreCat)
  • Fix: Allow releases of Magic Hatching Potions that don't coincide exactly with Gala start/end dates (@SabreCat and @phillipthelen)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

Client

  • Fix: Position avatar elements correctly when user does not have a background (@negue)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.35.1 Fixes
entry.content:
API

  • Fix: Don't try to save to user history before it's been initialized (@phillipthelen)

Client

  • Fix: Correctly display chat like button for messages liked by other users but not the logged-in user (@negue)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.35.2 Cron Improvements
entry.content:
API

  • Fix: Improved program flow and error handling to address scenarios where start-of-day processing fails to complete (@phillipthelen)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)
